title: Chelsea plot transfer raid for Monaco's Benjamin Mendy and Bernardo Silva after watching them embarrass Manchester City
text:

Chelsea are preparing a £40million double swoop for two of the Monaco stars who helped knock Manchester City out of the Champions League last week. 
Benjamin Mendy and Bernardo Silva have played major roles in their team’s pursuit of European and Ligue 1 glory this season. 
Blues manager Antonio Conte has been hugely impressed with the performances of the 22-year-olds. Conte is closing in on the title but needs reinforcements for the Champions League (Photo: PA) Read More 
The Italian is looking to strengthen his squad as Chelsea prepare to return to the Champions League next season and Mendy, who operates on the left flank, and right-sided Silva would be welcome additions. 
Frenchman Mendy would cost around £12m, and Portugal international Silva around £28m. Like us on Facebook
